options: ['Raj and Lu.', 'Raj , Amy and Lu.', 'Ben and Tom.', 'Mavish, Ben and Tom.']
questions: Who is going to the new film?
article:
The students are talking about their weekend plans.
Mavish: What are you going to do at the weekend, Amy?
Amy: I'm going to do my homework on Sunday. I've got a lot of homework. I didn't do in the week.
Mavish: Then we could all do something on Saturday?
Tom: I'm going swimming in the morning. But I'm not doing anything in the afternoon or evening.
Milly: I'm not doing anything then, either.
Lu: Raj and I are going to the news film in the afternoon. Let's all go out in the evening. Let's go to the club with a snooker table. I like playing snooker. I'm getting better at it.
Milly: Good idea. What about you, Ben? Can you come?
Ben: Yes, I can. That's a great idea. I like snooker too.
Amy: I don't like snooker that much, but I'm not going to stay home if you are all going out! I'm going to come too.
Mavish: OK, so we will meet in the town center and go to the club. What time does the film finish, Raj?
Raj: The film finishes at about five. We are going to have a burger and a drink after the film. Let's all meet and eat and then go to the club.
Ben: Good idea. Let's meet at about five and eat.
Milly, Tom, Mavish and Amy: OK.
